summary.span: 命名空间包含组件用于访问类型信息和调用类型成员的接口。

span.span: The namespace contains interfaces that components use to access type information and invoke type members.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的接口命名空间，以启用远程对象的访问类型信息的组件，而不必直接访问远程对象。Use the interfaces in the namespace to enable components to access type information for a remote object without having direct access to the of the remote object. 命名空间定义的组件使用的接口和结构中的反射功能， ，和命名空间进行通信。The namespace defines reflection functionality for components that use the interfaces and structures in the , , and namespaces to communicate. 这些命名空间中的接口也称为协定。The interfaces in these namespaces are also called contracts. 所有协定都派生自接口。All contracts derive from the interface. 当使用协定管理组件之间的通信，则必须实现类型公开到其他组件的类型信息中的接口。When using contracts to manage the communication between components, you must implement the interface in a type to expose the type information to other components. 组件然后可以通过调用访问该类型的成员方法要获取的接口。Components can then access the members of the type by calling the method of the interface to get an . 另一个接口，并在结构命名空间提供的类型为委托、 属性、 方法、 事件和字段的信息的访问。The other interfaces and structures in the namespace provide access to type information for delegates, properties, methods, events, and fields. 组件可以使用中的协定一个对象，它在不同进程或应用程序域中或在相同进程或应用程序域中的访问类型信息的命名空间。Components can use the contracts in the namespace to access type information for an object that is in a different process or application domain, or in the same process or application domain.
